name: Padding
desc: The object for defining space around the content in a table cell.

items.name: bottom
items.desc: The amount of padding between the bottom of the cell and the content, as a number in points or using the available units for components. See Specifying Measurements for Components.

items.name: left
items.desc: The amount of padding between the left side of the cell and the content, as a number in points or using the available units for components.See Specifying Measurements for Components.

items.name: right
items.desc: The amount of padding between the right side of the cell and the content, as as a number in points or using the available units for components.See Specifying Measurements for Components.

items.name: top
items.desc: The amount of padding between the top of the cell and the content, as as a number in points or using the available units for components. See Specifying Measurements for Components.
